description: A suit of snug, black leather.  Has no pockets, but does feature an abundance of unusually located zippers.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A colorful and ridiculous costume fit for a clown.  Provides decent storage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A full-body costume in the form of an anthropomorphic dinosaur.  It is quite encumbering and has little storage but is very warm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A one-piece suit of full-body long underwear that helps to maintain body temperature.  It laces closed in the front.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A full body fursuit in the form of an anthropomorphic wolf.  It is quite encumbering and has little storage but is very warm.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
An encumbering wool suit covered in nice patterns.  It looks like full body armor but it only protects against cold, sadly.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

Short for 'zenshin taitsu', a zentai is a form fitting full body nylon and spandex garment.  Though it covers your face, you can see through the integrated hood.  With a couple of these and some friends and you could put on some kabuki.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
